comments_since_last_sample.body: How does one get a job at the royal armoury? that is a dream job!
React to the guns in State of Decay 2.
You guys should show him the days gone weapons

22:10 OMG that is my biggest pet peeve in this game... I noticed it 1 minute in... 
That and the fact it doesn't work perfectly in Ultrawide  resolution, we have Unreal to blame for that.
The berretta felt so weird and I couldn't explain it. Thank you for saving me from that.
He should review the guns in DayZ, I think they're very accurate because full auto is only ever useful when you need to save yourself because the recoil is hard.
